name: ShotForge
description: A sandbox to build the coolest guns in.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-6400 / AMD FX-4100 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 / AMD Radeon 290 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I found it a bit strange that many of the great VR experiences are free. This is one of those. Thanks!
